category: Member Sports Group Regulations/Article 34 (Approval of Articles of Incorporation, etc.)
contents: Article 34 (Approval of Articles of Incorporation, etc.) ① City/provincial sports organizations shall enact and revise the articles of incorporation (regulations) of the city/provincial sports organizations in accordance with the regulations set by the city/provincial sports council pursuant to Article 32, and in this case, the member sports organizations Approval must be obtained from the city/provincial sports council after consultation with the city/provincial sports council. Revised 2021. 10. 6. ② The city/provincial sports association cannot approve if the city/provincial sports organization has not consulted with the member sports organizations regarding the enactment or revision of the articles of incorporation (bylaws). Revised 2021. 10. 6. ③ City/provincial sports organizations must obtain approval from member sports organizations for professional regulations related to the event, such as competition operation regulations for the relevant event. [Title revised 2021. 10. 6.]
